backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user IDs, role-based registration, and a one-time superadmin claim with access-control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three InternalLogin.tsx modifications related to superadmin claim UI, handler hardening, and mutation rules.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing every frontend file’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell that loads the React app root and boots main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Manual history-based router selecting page components for all routes with a 404 fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, auto-refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity auth, offering identity state, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook that checks whether the current actor can create a task UI.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login page showing disabled login options and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form collecting basic user info like name, email, WhatsApp, and company.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard with a static message and disabled logout button.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Dashboard for assistant users displaying a thank‑you message.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard showing a create‑task button enabled based on query result.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Concierge dashboard with a gratitude message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Finance dashboard displaying a message about maintaining financial health.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Static partner dashboard page showing a header with disabled logout and a centered welcome message.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Static superadmin dashboard page with a disabled logout button and a central control message.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Landing page for internal users providing navigation to login and registration flows.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Internal login page handling Internet Identity auth, role selection, and superadmin-claim logic.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Static internal registration form collecting basic user details and role.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with login and registration links for client and partner users.
Partner login page with disabled authentication buttons and links to registration.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Partner registration form collecting personal info, skills, and location.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining dark mode, content paths, extended color/theme settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing frontend/static UI rules, backend scope, known issues, and architectural constraints for current development.
